channel.title: Been up all night, Expect a video or even a proof of concept
channel.description:
progress: mouse red-dot added to show mouse location on client screen one input file for multiple bots. re-starting the runtime no longer needed when destroying clients 2 threads, one for paintings, one for processing file input and sending events to helper awt threads. runs off any browser on runescape.com
full Mouse event logging to file, exception logging
currently: writing parsing procedures to parse the input file and construct events to be sent. (bots write to the input file)
trackback: http://www.impsoft.net/viewtopic.php?t=96

item.title: Been up all night, Expect a video or even a proof of concept
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

lol ive been up all night too, right now im learning java server side implementations thoguh the client, in otherword manupilating the server though the client…

this is some hard stuff…

Read full topic
